column1: '''''Tolkien Journal'' (Vol.3, No.3)''' is an issue of the ''[[Tolkien Journal]]''. The article "Tolkien Notes from All Over" includes extracts from a letter by [[J.R.R. Tolkien
column2: Tolkien]] (p. 3) to the [[Tolkien Society of America]] concerning ''[[The Tolkien Relation]]'' by William Ready.<ref>[http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=55270 Tolkien Journal.
